content: witcher geralt & ciri amigurumi some people asked me to make a pattern for my the witcher 3 amigurumi i posted on instagram and reddit so here it is for geralt and ciri it s not perfect and some parts like the hair will require a bit of improvising so it s helpful if you have some basic crocheting knowledge already if there is anything you don t understand send me a dm and i will try my best to help please read this is an unofficial fan work and is not approved/endorsed by cd projekt red you may not sell my pattern or the finished products since all rights of witcher related stuff belong to cd projekt red but feel free to make some gifts for your friends and family if you post pictures of your figures online please credit me by adding a link to one of my social media accounts from below thank you instagram @yelanah crafts ravelry yelanahcrafts 1/7 i used 100% cotton yarn aran 50g/85m and a 3 5mm crochet hook and the size of the finished figures is about 20 cm 7 8 inches for some of the smaller details i used 100% cotton yarn dk 50g/115m and a 3mm crochet hook you will work in continuous rounds most of the time except for the arms hair and details the body is crocheted in one piece without sewing what you ll need abbreviations us terms crochet hook & yarn single_crochet single_crochet safety eyes or black felt increase increase turquoise felt or pearls
